text: A little later today, I will be in San Diego to visit with mothers at the Otay Mesa Detention Facility who were separated from their children at the border. I’ll share updates of what I see and learn. Check back with me as the day goes on.

As I prepare to visit mothers at the Otay Mesa Detention Facility who were separated from their children at the border, I’m thinking of the more than 2,000 children who woke up this morning scared and without their parents. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1010181073953804288/img/3oO0hUzA06on2OiJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1010181073953804288/vid/240x240/2NhXiRJnv4vPY5Iv.mp4?tag=2
